forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 67. West wind 14 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfurls under a warm embrace of sunshine, the kind that gently invites you to linger a moment longer in the elements. The temperature hovers comfortably around sixty-seven, a delightful setting to take a stroll or unearth the secrets of the city you’ve yet to explore. With the west wind nudging at fourteen to eighteen miles per hour and occasional gusts chiming in at twenty-three, it offers a refreshing touch, reminding you that even in summer, San Francisco dances at the boundary of warmth and coolness. 

As the sun begins its descent and the evening beckons, expect the skies to remain mostly clear, with temperatures slipping to a soft fifty-seven. The gentle winds will continue to weave through the evening air, offering a serene backdrop to your nighttime ventures. Today’s clarity is poignant, posing only a distant hint of fog on the horizon, its influence kept at bay. This presents a splendid opportunity to wear light layers, perhaps a breathable sweater or a light jacket that can be easily shed as the sun casts its warm glow. As evening approaches, consider gathering your loved ones for a casual meal at an outdoor café or perhaps seek a quiet corner in a nearby park, where the day’s remnants melt seamlessly into twilight, holding hands with the rhythms of a calm San Francisco evening.
